mapper.select: SELECT b.buss_no , b.prjt_no , p.prjt_nm , NVL(b.buss_upcd, 0) AS buss_upcd , b.buss_nm , m.memb_id , CASE b.buss_imp WHEN '0J1' THEN '상' WHEN '0J2' THEN '중' WHEN '0J3' THEN '하' END AS buss_imp , b.buss_prgre , b.buss_frdt , b.buss_todt , b.buss_st FROM business b LEFT JOIN project p ON b.prjt_no = p.prjt_no LEFT JOIN business_member m ON b.buss_no = m.buss_no WHERE (buss_st = '0K1' OR buss_st = '0K3') AND memb_id = #{membId} ORDER BY buss_frdt
mapper.update: UPDATE business SET buss_st = '0K3' WHERE buss_st = '0K1' AND sysdate > buss_todt
mapper.select:
SELECT P.PRJT_NM, B.BUSS_NM, B.BUSS_FRDT, B.BUSS_TODT, B.BUSS_IMP, FIND_CODENM(B.BUSS_IMP) AS bussImpNm
FROM BUSINESS B, BUSINESS_MEMBER BM, PROJECT P
WHERE BM.BUSS_NO = B.BUSS_NO AND P.PRJT_NO = B.PRJT_NO AND BM.MEMB_ID = #{membId}
ORDER BY buss_todt
SELECT buss_nm, buss_no FROM BUSINESS WHERE prjt_no = #{prjtNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(BUSS_NO),0)+1 AS BUSS_NO FROM BUSINESS
INSERT INTO BUSINESS (BUSS_NO, PRJT_NO, BUSS_NM,
BUSS_UPCD,
BUSS_IMP, BUSS_PRGRE, BUSS_FRDT, BUSS_TODT, BUSS_CMPLTDT ) VALUES(
#{bussNo}, #{prjtNo}, #{bussNm},
#{bussUpcd},
#{bussImp}, 0, #{bussFrdt}, #{bussTodt}, NULL )
mapper.select:
SELECT b.buss_no, b.prjt_no, p.prjt_nm, b.buss_upcd, b.buss_nm, b.buss_imp, b.buss_prgre, b.buss_frdt, b.buss_todt, b.buss_cmpltdt, b.buss_st, FIND_CODENM(BUSS_ST) as bussStNm, FIND_CODENM(BUSS_IMP) as bussImpNm,
( SELECT BUSS_NM FROM BUSINESS WHERE BUSS_NO = ( select buss_upcd from business where buss_no = #{bussNo})) as bussUpNm
FROM BUSINESS b , PROJECT p
WHERE b.prjt_no = p.prjt_no AND b.buss_no = #{bussNo}
mapper.update:
UPDATE BUSINESS SET BUSS_NM =#{bussNm}, BUSS_IMP =#{bussImp}, BUSS_UPCD =#{bussUpcd}, BUSS_PRGRE=#{bussPrgre}, BUSS_FRDT =#{bussFrdt}, BUSS_TODT =#{bussTodt},
BUSS_ST = '0K1', BUSS_CMPLTDT = NULL
BUSS_ST = '0K2', BUSS_CMPLTDT = trunc(SYSDATE)
BUSS_ST = '0K3', BUSS_CMPLTDT = NULL
BUSS_ST = '0K4', BUSS_CMPLTDT = trunc(SYSDATE)
WHERE BUSS_NO = #{bussNo}
